On Thursday 16 December 2004 12:39, Thomas L Roche wrote:
>  Jason Rogers Thu, 16 Dec 2004 09:26:50 -0500
>
>  > One source to look at for testing SWT things is Kent Beck's TDD book
>
> 
> (http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0321146530/102-3564878-60257
>13?v=glance).
>
>  > I read it some time back, but as I recall he goes through creating
>  > the JUnit plug-in in a test-first fashion.
>
>  Umm ... what edition? I have 4th printing (Mar 2004) and IIRC there is
>  literally nothing in there about Eclipse or SWT or any UI discussion
>  of consequence. <quick look> Nothing in the index, certainly.
>
>  > So, he's bound to have tests in the book for SWT components.
>
>  Alas the premise fails ...

Sorry, wrong book in mind.  I meant this one that Kent co-authored with Erich 
Gamma:
    http://www.aw-bc.com/catalog/academic/product/0,1144,0321205758,00.html

--
